title: Fragment, 1100
medium:
Medium: cotton, wool
Technique: slit tapestry, use of non-horizontal wefts; warp selvage at slit-tab fringe; one intact side
creditline: Gift of the Museum of the Cranbrook Academy of Art
description: Border strip with flat tapestry woven fringe. Slanting bands of stylized bird motifs. Tan on red background.
